node.title: My foremost goal in 2009 is to:
node.author: Arunbear

data.field: Learn more Perl Learn a new language / skill Contribute to Perl 6 / Parrot Contribute to another open source project Finally get around to writing that killer module I've always wanted to Start my own business Write a book Help others achieve their potential Lose weight Kick that $habit Stay out of gaol Do something else
